SMSProviderConfigurationScreen.form.webh: The JSON payload features two key fields: 'to' for the recipient and 'body' for the SMS content

Each webhook event request includes a signature to confirm it comes from Authgear. This signature is a hex-encoded HMAC-SHA256 of the request body, provided in the HTTP header x-authgear-body-signature. For details on how to validate the signature, {ExternalLink, react, children{click here} href{{href}}}.
You can set it from 1 to 60 seconds. If the webhook doesn’t respond in time, the SMS is marked as undelivered.

The interval to reset failed attempts after the last failure.

A user account will be locked after {attempts} failed login attempts. The failure attempts will be reset after {resetIntervalMins, plural, one{# minute} other{# minutes}} of the last failure. {resetIntervalHoursDisplayed, select, false {} other {(i.e. {resetIntervalHours, plural, one{# hour} other{# hours}})}}
LoginMethodConfigurationScreen.lockout.d: Configure the number of minutes an account will remain locked when it has exceeded the lockout threshold.
This determines how long the account will remain locked.
This value will increase the lockout duration exponentially.
This will allow you to put a cap on the lockout duration.

If a user account has exceeded the lockout threshold, it will be locked for {durationMins, plural, one{# minute} other{# minutes}}. For every subsequent failed attempt, the user must wait for another {durationMins, plural, one{# minute} other{# minutes}} until a correct password is entered.

If a user account has exceeded the lockout threshold, it will be locked for {durationMins, plural, one{# minute} other{# minutes}}. For every subsequent failed attempt, lockout duration will increase by {backoffFactor} times (e.g. {durationMins, plural, one{# min} other{# mins}}, {durationMinsSecond, plural, one{# min} other{# mins}}, {durationMinsThird, plural, one{# min} other{# mins}}...) until it reaches the maximum of {maxDurationMins, plural, one{# minute} other{# minutes}} {maxDurationHoursDisplayed, select, false{} other {(i.e. {maxDurationHours, plural, one{# hour} other{# hours}})}}.
